overview: I develop frontend , user interfaces and web application
about_me: I am a 3rd year student studying at Saigon University of Technology. I am a student passionate about web programming, especially application and website development.I want to understand more, learn and develop myself in a real-life environment to become an influential web programmer.
intro_my_project: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies,and manage projects effectively.
I self-study and build website interface: I self-study and build website interfaces . This is the first project so there are many mistakes. Only the interface has been built and the purchasing features have not yet been developed
This is my semester project. I use java: This is my semester project. I use java to handle the logic and models, and for the interface I use java swing. I use Map to manage keywords with keys and values, my project includes the basic functions of a dictionary application. The function I like most is looking up words with the Levenshtein algorithm to find the closest word when not in the map.
I taught myself nodejs and reactjs and l: I taught myself nodejs and reactjs and learned how to create a complete website. I wrote RestfulAPI, using jwt to authenticate users. Combined react-text-to-speach to develop voice search function and integrated openAi with nlp to train more data for AI model for customers Customers can get more information about the shop. This project has many errors that I have not optimized to increase user experience.

This is my 2nd project using MERN. I wro: This is my 2nd project using MERN. I wrote restfullAPI for users, posts, reels, messages,.... Implement real-time messaging as well as real-time comments and likes. I store images and videos on cloudinary through multer so I can post multiple photos or one photo for users. For the user interface, I use antd . The project is in the process of being stopped because I'm busy with a lot of work, but will probably continue after a while to complete a complete project.
